messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Good Bye for a while!
messages.msgSnippet: Elissa Jill, I hope everything goes well and you can join us again soon. Enjoy your new house. :-) Barb E One of the most tragic things I know about human
messages.messageBody:
Elissa Jill,
I hope everything goes well and you can join us again soon. Enjoy your
new house. :-)

Barb E
"One of the most tragic things I know about human
nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are
all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon,
instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside
our windows today."

- Dale Carnegie, Author




on 1/24/03 10:06 AM, Earthmomma67@... at Earthmomma67@... wrote:

> I'll miss you guys!

messages.subject: Good Bye for a while!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, I ll be going no mail for a while, maybe a month while we move and get settled into our new home. I can be reached at Earthmomma67@aol.com if you want
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
I'll be going no mail for a while, maybe a month while we move and get
settled into our new home. I can be reached at
Earthmomma67@... if you want to say hi!
I'll miss you guys!



*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.
